lead_paragraph: Joe Calzaghe of Wales, the super-middleweight world champion, has said he would fight Roy Jones Jr. in a bout in September at Madison Square Garden, boxingtalk.com reported. Calzaghe, a 36-year-old who is unbeaten in 45 professional fights, moved up to light-heavyweight in April and defeated Bernard Hopkins in a nontitle bout. Calzaghe told the Web site he planned to retire after fight Jones.
